format: html

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
squid_rev <- eis %>% 
  filter(comm_name == "Market squid")
  
squid_output<-lm(value_usd ~ year, data=squid_rev) #linear model (lm) 
squid_output # gets only the coefficients
summary(squid_output)  


```
